user.title: Ajax Systems MQTT Bridge
user.description: Configure connection to receive Ajax sensor states from Jeedom via MQTT. Requires Jeedom with ajaxSystem plugin publishing to MQTT.

data_description.jeedom_mqtt_topic: MQTT topic where Jeedom publishes Ajax events (default: jeedom/cms/event)
data_description.jeedom_mqtt_language: Language to translate French sensor names to
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA DC-09 receiver for additional real-time alarm events
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events (default: 2410)
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub
data_description.sia_encryption_key: AES encryption key if encryption is enabled

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MQTT broker. Check your Home Assistant MQTT configuration.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Ajax system is already configured.
